meanings.definition: A Korean pancake made with various ingredients such as vegetables, seafood, or meat.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious jeon with vegetables for lunch.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best jeon with seafood on weekends.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone loved the jeon with meat, it disappeared quickly!
meanings.sent4: The jeon with vegetables was a colorful and flavorful delight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling jeon filled the kitchen with a tempting scent.

meanings.definition: A unit of North Korean currency.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged some dollars for jeon to use during my trip.
meanings.sent2: The price of the souvenir was 10 jeon.
meanings.sent3: I found a lucky jeon on the street and picked it up for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the game, players collected jeon to advance to the next level.
meanings.sent5: The old coin collector had a rare jeon in his collection.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Jeon is a kind teacher at our school.
meanings.sent2: The Jeon family has been living in the neighborhood for years.
meanings.sent3: During the event, many people mistook me for a Jeon.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the hero's last name was Jeon, symbolizing bravery.
meanings.sent5: The Jeon surname has a rich history in Korean culture.
